title: Editorial Policy
description: How we keep content neutral and separate from advertising.
main_html:
If you only read one thing:

Before contacting any provider, make sure you understand what is being offered, how credentials are verified, and what questions you need answered in writing.

Editorial

Editorial Policy

Neutral, checklist-based content. Advertising is separate and clearly labeled.

Funding & advertising

Advertising, when present, is clearly labeled “Advertising” and is visually separate from editorial content.

Corrections

We correct factual errors when notified. Use the contact page to request a correction.

Rankings

We do not publish rankings and we do not endorse providers.

%%AD:global_editorial_bottom%%

Why this matters: clarifying expectations early reduces misunderstandings, delays, and unnecessary costs later.
